verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spake <WH1696> unto Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah <WH5374>, when he had written <WH3789> these words <WH1697> in a book <WH5612> at the mouth <WH6310> of Jeremiah <WH3414>, in the fourth <WH7243> year <WH8141> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, saying <WH559>,
Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, unto thee, O Baruch <WH1263>;

Thou didst say <WH559>, Woe <WH188> is me now! for the LORD <WH3068> hath added <WH3254> grief <WH3015> to my sorrow <WH4341>; I fainted <WH3021> in my sighing <WH585>, and I find <WH4672> no rest <WH4496>.

Thus shalt thou say <WH559> unto him, The LORD <WH3068> saith <WH559> thus; Behold, that which I have built <WH1129> will I break down <WH2040>, and that which I have planted <WH5193> I will pluck up <WH5428>, even this whole land <WH776>.

And seekest <WH1245> thou great things <WH1419> for thyself? seek <WH1245> them not: for, behold, I will bring <WH935> evil <WH7451> upon all flesh <WH1320>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068>: but thy life <WH5315> will I give <WH5414> unto thee for a prey <WH7998> in all places <WH4725> whither thou goest <WH3212>.
